summary: Build a React app for a camera repair/service center to track repair jobs (CRUD), with list/dashboard views, search/filtering by status, job detail view, and a settings screen showing basic stats.

User explicitly requested a blue color theme; theme guidance should allow blue (overrides prior avoidance note).
